thread.title: 9 Quirky Truths Only Cat Owners Who Are Actually Allergic To Cats Will Get
thread.title_full: 9 Quirky Truths Only Cat Owners Who Are Actually Allergic To Cats Will Get

author: Crystal Ro
title: 9 Quirky Truths Only Cat Owners Who Are Actually Allergic To Cats Will Get
text:
View this image ›
Crystal Ro / BuzzFeed You just don’t understand until you’re a cat mom/dad.
ID: 10523388 2. You find yourself vacuuming WAY more often now than when you didn’t have a cat. View this image ›
Crystal Ro / BuzzFeed Me every weekend: “Sorry, busy removing cat hair from…everywhere.”
ID: 10508380 3. You’re perfectly willing to suffer a sneezing fit just for a few minutes of cuddle time with your cat. View this image ›
Crystal Ro / BuzzFeed Totally – ACHOO!! – worth it.
ID: 10523780 4. Your bag/purse/whatever is constantly stocked with antihistamines. View this image ›
Crystal Ro / BuzzFeed Allegra? Claritin? Zyrtec? You’ve got it all!
ID: 10522719 5. And you love giving your cat kisses even though it means your lips will probably swell up afterwards. View this image ›
Crystal Ro / BuzzFeed Whatever, it eventually goes away.
ID: 10532923 6. You probably tried making your cat sleep ~somewhere else~ when you first got him/her. L L. View this image ›
Crystal Ro / BuzzFeed You: “Sleep out on the sofa.” Your cat: “Nah.”
ID: 10532464 7. You wash your hands about 1,246 times a day because you can’t help petting your cat. View this image ›
Crystal Ro / BuzzFeed Pet cat, wash hands, repeat. Forever.
ID: 10548018 8. You sometimes tell yourself, “Maybe my body will get used to my cat?”…and then you immediately sneeze. View this image ›
Crystal Ro / BuzzFeed Dare to dream.
ID: 10548302 9. And finally, you know you’re perfectly willing to endure stupid allergies because your cat is 101% worth it. View this image ›
Crystal Ro / BuzzFeed
ID: 10570390 Check out more articles on BuzzFeed.com!
